Axon.title: Software Engineer II
responsibilities: Unified JavaScript configurations to allow internal libraries to be shared across all Axon products.
Led the integration of Evidence.com into Axon Records.
Designed and developed Axon Record’s rich text editing feature.
Led bi-weekly front end chats to encourage consistent educational engagement in new front end technologies.
Conducted mentorship, pair programming, and code reviews for new hires and junior software engineers.
Actively helped with recruiting and hiring future colleagues by interviewing candidates and attending debriefing sessions.
Instrumental front-end engineer for Axon Records, a disruptive records management system for law enforcement.
Implemented multiple UI features with React, TypeScript, Apollo, GraphQL, and Node.
Consistently delivered high quality results against many deadlines leading up to the launch of Axon Records.
Built reusable UI components for our internal libraries, reviewed code for front-end engineers, fixed bugs, among other essential tasks.

Siemens.title: Software Engineer Intern
responsibilities: Worked on NX, an advanced high-end CAD/CAM/CE software.
Designed and implemented a validity checker to allow users to analyze and ensure that their model data is correct.

LinkedIn.title: UI Engineer Intern
responsibilities: Worked with the Web Frameworks team that builds internal tools and plugins for front-end engineers.
Designed and implemented a web application that allows front-end engineers to track, debug, and analyze their service configuration in a more efficient way.

Extron.title: Web Developer Intern
responsibilities: Worked with the Web team that builds and maintains the company’s e-commerce website.
Collaborated with product managers, writers, and designers to update and create new content.
Analyzed databases in SQL to improve usability and experience.
